languages.text: {n}Менее сведущий человек на вашем месте мог бы не опознать этого огромного гуманоида, но вы понимаете, что перед вами космический десантник, Ангел Императора. {/n}
{n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Менее сведущий человек на вашем месте мог бы не опознать этого огромного гуманоида, но вы понимаете, что перед вами космический десантник, Ангел Императора. {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might mistake this giant for a mutant or an Ogryn, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might mistake this giant for a mutant or an Ogryn, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}如果是不了解情况的人，可能会误以为这个身材魁梧的家伙根本不是人类，但你很清楚，这是一位星际战士，是帝皇的天使。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}如果是不了解情况的人，可能会把这个身材魁梧的人误认为是变种人或欧格林。但你很清楚，这是一位星际战士，是帝皇的天使。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}知識のない者なら、この巨大な人型生物を認識しないかもしれないが、この人物は「皇帝の天使」と呼ばれるスペースマリーンであることは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}知識のない者なら、この巨大な人型生物を認識しないかもしれないが、この人物は「皇帝の天使」と呼ばれるスペースマリーンであることは明らかだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Una persona menos entendida podría no reconocer a este gigantesco humanoide, pero tú sabes bien que se trata de un Marine Espacial, un ángel del Emperador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una persona menos informada podría pensar que este gigante es un mutante o un ogrete, pero sabes bien que se trata de un Marine Espacial, un ángel del Emperador.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Quelqu'un de moins bien informé pourrait ne pas reconnaître cet humanoïde géant, mais vous savez que vous vous tenez devant un Space Marine, un ange de l'Empereur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelqu'un de moins informé pourrait prendre ce géant pour un mutant ou un ogryn, mais vous savez que vous vous tenez devant un Space Marine, un ange de l'Empereur.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Eine schlechter informierte Person würde diesen riesigen Humanoiden wohl nicht erkennen, aber du weißt, dass es sich hier um einen Space Marine handelt, einen Engel des Imperators.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine schlechter informierte Person könnte diesen Riesen mit einem Mutanten oder Ogryn verwechseln, aber du weißt, dass es sich hier um einen Space Marine handelt, einen Engel des Imperators.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Pek de irfan sahibi olmayan bu şahıs, bu devasa insansının ne olduğunu kavrayamayabilir. Sense onun bir Uzay Piyadesi, yani İmparator'un Meleği olduğunun farkındasın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A less knowledgeable person might not recognise this giant humanoid, but you are well aware that this is a Space Marine, an Angel of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Daha az irfan sahibi bir şahıs, bu devasa insansının ne olduğunu kavrayamayabilir ancak sen, onun bir Uzay Piyadesi, yani İmparator'un bir Meleği olduğunun gayet farkındasın.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
